normalised: Manufacturing and Supply Chain: Inventory Forecasting

unnormalised: Pune - Accurate inventory forecasting is becoming increasingly crucial for Indian manufacturers navigating volatile markets. Dr. Sharma at IIT Bombay emphasizes the need for incorporating advanced analytics to predict demand fluctuations, especially during festival seasons like Diwali.

The Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) is organizing workshops on implementing robust forecasting models.
